about_the_game:
Epic 1 Expansion Pack


4E Fantasy Token Pack

This product is a module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. This pack contains image tokens suitable for ALL Epic tier monsters from the FIRST core 4E monster book. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game. Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32, 50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best meets your needs.

This pack contains tokens for the following characters:

  • abomination astral stalker (medium)
  • abomination atropal (large)
  • abomination blood fiend (medium)
  • abomination phane (large)
  • abomination tarrasque (gargantuan)
  • angel valor cohort (medium)
  • battlebriar earthrage (huge)
  • chuul juggernaut (huge)
  • colossus godforged (huge)
  • death knight dragonborn (medium)
  • demon balor (huge)
  • demon glabrezu (huge)
  • demon hezrou (large)
  • demon marilith (large)
  • devil legion legionnaire (medium)
  • devil pit fiend (large)
  • devil war (large)
  • dracolich blackfire (gargantuan)
  • dracolich runescribed (gargantuan)
  • dragonborn champion (medium)
  • dragonspawn bluespawn godslayer (huge)
  • dragon black ancient (gargantuan)
  • dragon blue ancient (gargantuan)
  • dragon green ancient (gargantuan)
  • dragon red ancient (gargantuan)
  • dragon red elder (huge)
  • dragon tiamat (gargantuan)
  • dragon white ancient (gargantuan)
  • efreet cinderlord (large)
  • efreet fireblade (large)
  • efreet flamestrider (large)
  • efreet karadjin (large)
  • efreet pyresinger (large)
  • eladrin ghaele winter (medium)
  • elemental earthwind ravager (large)
  • elemental thunderblast cyclone (huge)
  • flameskull great (small)
  • ghost tormenting (medium)
  • ghoul abyssal myrmidon (medium)
  • giant death (large)
  • giant death titan (huge)
  • giant fire titan (huge)
  • giant storm (large)
  • giant storm titan (huge)
  • gibbering orb (huge)
  • gorgon storm (large)
  • grimlock follower (medium)
  • hound wild hunt (medium)
  • hydra primordial (gargantuan)
  • larva mage (medium)
  • lich eladrin wizard (medium)
  • lich vestige (medium)
  • marut blademaster (medium)
  • marut concordant (large)
  • mummy giant (large)
  • naga primordial (large)
  • orcus aspect (large)
  • orcus deathpriest hierophant (medium)
  • orcus (gargantuan)
  • orcus ghoul king (medium)
  • purple worm elder (gargantuan)
  • rakshasa dread knight (medium)
  • roc thunderhawk (huge)
  • rot harbinger slinger (medium)
  • sorrowsworn deathlord (large)
  • sorrowsworn reaper (medium)
  • sorrowsworn shadowraven swarm (medium)
  • sorrowsworn soulripper (medium)
  • specter voidsoul (medium)
  • swordwing crownwing (large)
  • swordwing (medium)
  • wraith dread (large)
  • wyvern fell (large)
  • yuanti anathema (huge)
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison
detailed_description:

4E Fantasy Token Pack

This product is a module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop. This pack contains image tokens suitable for ALL Epic tier monsters from the FIRST core 4E monster book. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x or 8x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
